name: Shadow Crypt
description:
Shadow Crypt is a third person zelda-like rpg where the player makes use of reality bending spells to make their way through challenging puzzle dungeons.  

Shadow Crypt was one of my third year final projects.  It is unlikely to see additional work, what is available here is a prototype/mvp, it consists of one dungeon set near the end of the game and as such it is quite difficult (probably too difficult).  It is designed to show case everything the concept had to offer and therefore makes use of the majority of the spells available to the player and mechanics that compliment them.
